lead_paragraph: Louisiana State Coach Les Miles has signed a contract extension that will keep him with the Tigers through 2012. The deal was approved yesterday by the L.S.U. board’s athletic committee, apparently ending any chance of Miles leaving for Michigan to replace Lloyd Carr, who retired last month.
